items.name: Wooden Flute
items.description: You can play a little tune with this.

items.name: Raw Meat
items.description: Not suitable for human consumption. Maybe a beast would like it.
items.onFail: You took out the Raw Meat. Nothing happened.
items.onSuccess: You dangled the Raw Meat tantalizingly. The beast is pacified! It gets out of your way.

items.name: Potion
items.description: Looks like it may heal someone in bad health. You're in pretty good health.
items.onFail: You took out the potion. There's no use for it now.
items.onSuccess: You unstopped the cap and gave it to the man.
